name: Max's Mission to Mars
description: Max the robot is going on an adventure to Mars! Help him do the bidding of his master. Prepping a landing spot for his creator is his goal. He will need to create a suitable habitat, grow food plants, and build a base fit for his master! All it takes is a little robot elbow grease.  Best of all its FREE!! *PS its still an Alpha prototype so don't expect a lot at this point.
